trans-unit.source: Provides a service that represents indexed node control for a simple implementation of a node-based XAML reader.
trans-unit.target: 針對節點型 XAML 讀取器的簡單實作，提供表示索引節點控制的服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader> maintains its own index in an externally provided list of nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader> 會維護它自己在外部提供的節點清單的索引。

trans-unit.source: The list can be accessed by using an Index delegate.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用索引委派存取清單。

trans-unit.source: This design enables multiple XAML readers to access the same fixed-index node set.
trans-unit.target: 此設計可讓多個 XAML 讀取器，以存取相同的固定索引節點集。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of nodes in the current external node set.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前外部節點集中的節點數。

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes in the current external node set.
trans-unit.target: 目前外部節點集中的節點數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index number of the current reader position for the indexed list view of XAML nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 XAML 節點索引清單檢視中，目前讀取器位置的索引編號。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 目前讀取器位置的索引編號。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader.CurrentIndex%2A> property, you are using a XAML node reader mode that does not have to use `Read` or `Skip` to traverse all intermediate nodes.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlIndexingReader.CurrentIndex%2A>屬性，您使用不需要使用 XAML 節點讀取器模式`Read`或`Skip`周遊所有的中繼節點。
